content.text: I'll run the Claude Code doctor command to check your system health.

input.description: Run Claude Code system health check

content.content:
I need permission to run bash commands to check your Git installation and system configuration. The `claude /doctor` command I tried initially isn't available in your current environment.

To manually check your Git setup, you can run:
- `git --version` to verify Git is installed
- `git config --list` to check your Git configuration
- `pwd` to confirm your current directory

Would you like to grant me bash permissions so I can run these diagnostic commands for you?

content.text:
The `claude /doctor` command isn't available in your environment. To check your Git installation and system health, you can run:

```bash
git --version
git config --list
```

This will verify Git is installed and show your configuration.
